Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts; the beginning sees Miyazawa and his friends enjoying a good life out in nature and acting on their intentions to become writers.
